summary: A woman reeling from the death of her parents becomes attached to an alluring man whose sudden disappearance sends her and her friends into a haunted high-rise to find him
cast: Mischa Barton|Ryan Eggold|Leah Pipes|Frank Ashmore|Melinda Browne|Andy Chan|Ronnie Clark|Melinda Cohen|Ward Edmondson|Jessee Foudray|Mary Ann Gilbert|Willow Hale|Richard Johnson|Kenni Kinsey|Tammy Klein|Katie Kocis|Ryan Malachy|Noelle Marsh|Jaz Martin|Sexton Newby|Talon Reid|John Rubinstein|Carla Short|Zack Tiegen|Jim Tooey|Robert Towers|Rolonda Watts|Kris Wheeler|Samantha Acampora|Michael Canetty
title: I Will Follow You Into the Dark
